Package com.camerontec.util.collection.persisted

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IPersistentByteArrayStore
    Extension of the basic IByteArrayStore to add persistence based operations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PersistentByteArrayStoreProperties
    Contains common property definitions shared by a number of persistent store implementations as well as utility methods for accessing properties.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FileCorruptedException
    Instances of this unchecked exception type are thrown by IPersistentByteArrayStore implementations to report that a file which is supposed to contain stored data seems to be corrupted.
    InvalidFileFormatException
    Instances of this unchecked exception type are thrown by IPersistentByteArrayStore implementations to report that a file which is supposed to contain stored data is not in the expected format.
    PersistenceConfigurationException
    Instances of this unchecked exception type are thrown to report that some invalid configuration was encountered when loading an IPersistentByteArrayStore.
    PersistenceException
    Instances of this unchecked exception type are thrown to report errors occurring when reading from or writing to an IPersistentByteArrayStore.
    PersistenceIOException
    Instances of this unchecked exception type are thrown by IPersistentByteArrayStore implementations to report that an I/O related error occurred when interacting with the underlying file-system.
    PersistenceOperationInterruptedException
    Instances of this unchecked exception type are thrown to report that a persistence operation was interrupted and wrap the Throwable that is at the origin of this exception.
    PersistenceReadException
    Instances of this unchecked exception type are thrown to report errors occurring when reading from an IPersistentByteArrayStore.
    PersistenceWriteException
    Instances of this unchecked exception type are thrown to report errors occurring when write to an IPersistentByteArrayStore.
    UnsupportedPersistenceOperationException
    Instances of this unchecked exception type are thrown by IPersistentByteArrayStore implementations to report unsupported write operations.
